website_summaries.verdict: Simple, sophisticated, and sexy. No one would call these comfortable shoes, but they are definitely wearable for an event, an evening out, or a work day.
pros: Wrapped heel is comfortable in terms of height
Comes in a variety of colors
Patent leather, suede, reptile-embossed leather, or synthetic upper
cons: Low vamp shows toe cleavage, which some women do not like

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable Beautiful Heels
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this CK pump, and this is the 7th pair I’ve ordered. Heel heighth is perfect (I’m 64 and am not comfortable w/4 in. heels anymore), they’re super comfortable, and I love the many colors they come in. They fit my feet perfectly! I highly recommend for normal feet with no specific issues)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy F.

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS. (A tiny bit tight)
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the color of these pewter shoes is staggeringly beautiful. It almost has the glow of silver, but nnnnnot quite. The stripey texture gives it a nice adult bump but retains a rock star flair. They are a tiny bit tight, and that makes my otherwise fairly cute feet look a little pudgy. However, I wore them to work today and i can already feel them loosening a bit. I have faith these will be my new favorite thing. I wear a 6.5, these felt like... 6.25. But they're getting better. Love.
customer_reviews.author: elem1313

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a lot of research about what heels would be super-comfortable but also last. I've only worn them twice, so I can't speak to how well the quality is yet, but I can say I'm on my second 7-hour day in them and I'm in no pain whatsoever. I'm usually crippled by the end of the work day in new heels. They are a little tight around the top, but I'm sure they need to break a little. They feel cushioned without anything weird in the foot. They are a perfect, classic black pump with a lovely little metal detail on the heel. I would buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Greenveg6

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but beautiful pump
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this pump 4 stars based on appearance and craftsmanship. However they were not made to go out in to a party. When I put them on my toes squeezed together and make me want to take them right back off . I have a narrow size 6 foot! I thought maybe they would loosen up once worn a little bit. They did but not enough. I wore them out New Years Eve and it was torture. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very classy. Great fit. Comfortable heel height Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Deatrice Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for years for a high heel that’s not too high but still has that look of a classic stiletto. I have really big problems with my feet and these are so comfortable. Also really great for people with small ankles were your foot goes out of the shoot to easily. This fits perfectly. I have purchased this shoe in for different colors
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the shoes I wear between 38 and 39 so I ordered 38.5 and it fit like a glove and really comfortable great quality and lovely shade of silver the heel is just right sexy and yet not too high to break my back! I even order the gold as well and very delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Returned them right away!
customer_reviews.text: They are not LEATHER as described! They are man made plastic . I ordered size 9, and I wear 8.5, and even though they fit horrible. These shoes hurt my feet so bad at the minute I tried them on. I returned them right away with no hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: CeCDBen

customer_reviews.title: Great heel and fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how “authentic” these are, but I usually wear between a 7.5/8 for heels, and based on reviews got an 8. So comfy and fits perfectly! Def go with the bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I went up a half size to ensure comfort. Height of heel is perfect for the office... wear all day long without feel discomfort. This is 3rd pair of CK Women's Gayle pump. Highly recommended for office and other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: CaribbeanGirl7

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: so beautiful and actually comfortable for a heel. Its a low heel (around 3 fish inches), so you can wear it for multiple hours. I started using them for work and for nice events
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but rubber heel tip is cheap
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but the rubber heel tip has already worn away. I've only had these shoes a couple of months. They are in rotation, but are least once a week, at most. For $100, I expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: You need these heels!
customer_reviews.text: I love these heels, they are so comfortable. I had no problems wearing them all night the first time. No pain and no blisters! I love the colors offered and plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shoes, go up a 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect mob dress this fall. The color is stunning and they showed up quickly and were packaged well. I read other reviews before ordering and went up a 1/2 size. I normally wear a 9 and the 9 1/2 was perfect
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Will buy one in every color
customer_reviews.text: I walk all day at work these are so comfortable and just the perfect heel height in my opinion for a professional and classy work environment! ... will be buying more Calvin Klein shoes in different colors these are so comfy
customer_reviews.author: josh steadman

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe line - 9 1/2 w
customer_reviews.text: I’m so bummed that these squish my toes as the gayle shoe has so many tones and colors to chose from. I do have a wide toe line with narrow heel so this is par for the course.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mahardy

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these were way too small. I love the look of them but I don't think even a full size up would work. I normally buy regular width size shoes. They would be wonderful for someone with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: ac1234

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I put on my shoes the same night they arrived and looked amazing! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: Anne Klein  Pumps.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous , classy pump. Lovely color, heel height & fit perfect if I may say so
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor A. Todman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love love love the shoes and the fit cannot wait to wear them
customer_reviews.author: Nana Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several pairs in this design line. This one in gold runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Delanecpa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish shoes and very comfortable! It runs a half a size small. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: shafieka McRae

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, squeaky shoes
customer_reviews.text: Squeeze so much every step sounds like I’m squishing a duck . Way to noisy for my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Must return to tight.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Timely delivery. Shoe was just too narrow and tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: denkyles

customer_reviews.title: New favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the gayle fit!!!! Very comfortable - wore to work, straight out of the box, ZERO blisters!!!! very well made. Will buy again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: riderchic

customer_reviews.title: Classy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe as expected from the brand, it does need a bit of breaking in, but not too uncomfortable. Goes with anything, work, after-work etc. The height is also perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colour and height of the heel. Very comfy can be used for work or social events.
customer_reviews.author: CaribbeanGirl7

customer_reviews.title: Truly Royal
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoe that feels great considering it is a high heel! The color is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: The color was not as shown too light
customer_reviews.text: I was not too happy they were lighter than the picture
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are narrow!
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 8.5, but, I order a half size larger with close toe shoes. I ordered two different colors in a size 9 and they both ran VERY narrow! I am returning the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CrestNuess

customer_reviews.title: They fit well.
customer_reviews.text: These heels are good shoes and go great with my dark purple shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!!! Comfortable... so good looking and stylish... my new favorite
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Langley

customer_reviews.title: Love them but a tad tight, order a 1/2 size up to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, I wear a size 8 but wish I purchased a 8 1/2 as they are a little tight and after a few times of wearing them they are still tight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color, Tiny Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 styles of Calvin Klein shoes - the other one fit TTS and waas really comfortable, but this one was just very snug in the toe box, and I'm not sure I can break these in enough to make them as comfortable as the other pair. Shame because the color (Anthracite) is a super pretty shiny gunmetal color with textured vertical stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Ouch very uncomfortable. I wear pumps every day and this the worst yet.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several colors of the same. Size mostly runs small so I had to buy 0.5 size bigger, therefore I needed to return/exchange. Very stylish and comfy heels. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: tracker

customer_reviews.title: Received used!
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. The shoes arrived scuffed up like they’d been worn.
customer_reviews.author: Mikela

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at a local store for 2.5 times the price and then found the same one online. I returned the ones to the store and ordered the same size online. Perfect fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gillian H.

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was such a beautiful shoe but I chose the wrong size and I had to give it to my sister who is the bride . Really beautiful shoe. Would have complemented my dress nicely
customer_reviews.author: mary awaritefe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small and slender feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in three different colors. One of the most comfortable pairs of heels I’ve ever worn. I have small and slender feet so finding a pair that doesn’t slip off is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I have several different colors. To get this best fit, I have to stretch the instep out a little by putting them on with socks for about 30 mins. They fit just right after that.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Prcie

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes about 5 times and the heal broke today. I’m bummed because they are gorgeous. Hoping company will see this and offer to replace them if I send mine back.
customer_reviews.author: John Waksmonski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Calvin. Only brand I wear because fits perfectly every time
customer_reviews.author: dhs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, subtle metallic navy snakeskin pattern. The toes are a little tighter than expected. The heels don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah A.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe and it’s extremely comfortable. But after only a few hours wearing it, a small piece of the tip of one of the shoes peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein is my favorite brand!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! Tie area just a tad tight but the shoes are fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One shoe was too snall
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Right foot was smaller than the left. I have several other pairs of the same style, so I am sure of the size
customer_reviews.author: Kay Burns

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and buy a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pump. Buy a half a size larger. I use a 8.5 and ordered a half size larger after reading the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Soltero

customer_reviews.title: BE COMFORTABLE IN YOUR HEELS
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was gorgeous, however, made for a very slim foot.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The pump is just what I expected. I have other Calvin Klein pumps in other colors not ordered from Amazon, but this particular one is very pretty in person.
customer_reviews.author: V.M. Fayetteville, NC

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Fit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe , very sleek and sexy. Fits narrow had to stretch as much as possible to get some comfort
customer_reviews.author: patricia othoniel

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 5 stars. Calvin Klien brand is my favorite. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fits half size small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I wish they had not discontinued the Dolly model
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Bordeaux

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: First pair had major scratch. Reordered second pair was great. Awesome color!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly small
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe incredibly tight. They are so narrow. I have a medium sized foot and these are crazy narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Denitri Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Need a returning label
customer_reviews.text: This product is to small , need a returning label thank you
customer_reviews.author: sharon w.

customer_reviews.title: Love my snakeskin shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the shoe size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color,  Magenta
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes to a woman conference, I got lots of complements
customer_reviews.author: S D

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Gayle Pump
product_meta.description:
Pump

Calvin Klein is a premier American designer famous for the birth of designer jeans. Known as "the supreme master of minimalism," Calvin Klein is one of the world's leading lifestyle design companies known for minimalist and functional aesthetics. The brand is modern, uniquely sophisticated and offers timeless style. Calvin Klein handbags are designed with clean, classic, and trendy silhouettes. They provide accessible luxury for today's consumer and are the perfect blend of contemporary sophistication.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch

CALVIN KLEIN is a global lifestyle brand that exemplifies bold, progressive ideals and a seductive, and often minimal, aesthetic. We seek to thrill and inspire our audience while using provocative imagery and striking designs to ignite the senses.
STYLE AND DESIGN: Classic pointed toe pump with a 3 inch stiletto heel. Finished with a Calvin Klein logo plate at back heel.
COMFORT: Flexible for extended wear, with signature gel pod inserts for comfort and support. A slip-resistant and weather proof sole provides shock absorption with every step.
PERFECT FIT: Find the perfect fit with extended size and width offerings; wide widths offered in classic colors 5W-11W. This style runs true to size.
